title: IP gifting champions
body:
To Riot,

I have friends who have 100,000 + IP but they don't use them since they own all champions,rune,rune pages etc. They say they are useless unless for new champion or whatever and residual value still remains after purchase.

My question is are there any plans using IP to unlock champions for friends?. If not, why not?.

Thanks
Regards
